Get a Quote ENQUIRE 1300 256 067

Soneva Jani Resort 5* - 7 nights from AUD$8,749* per person

INCLUDES:

  • 7 nights at Soneva Jani Resort in a Water Retreat 1 Bedroom
  • American breakfast daily
  • Return seaplane transfers
  • Many Other Inclusions
  • Additional inclusions will vary on date of travel
  • All taxes are included with no hidden cost
  • Only honeymooners will also receive Complimentary Wedding/Anniversary Cake, Complimentary 1 x bottle of Champagne, Complimentary 1 x Soneva Photo frame, Complimentary 1 x Departure Gift, Complimentary 1 x Combined Dolphin Cruise during stay, Complimentary 1 x candlelit dinner for two person.
  With beautifully designed interiors made from sustainable materials, all villas are equipped with a spacious master bedroom with an adjoining kids sleeping area. All villas have an open-air bathroom with bathtub, shower and lagoon access. They also have a walk-in mini-bar with espresso machine and private wine cellar selection. An outdoor deck and seating area with sun loungers and direct access to the lagoon are also available. The main facilities of Soneva Jani are located at The Gathering, which is a three-storey structure that hosts the main dining outlets as well as an Observatory, a Spa, gift-shop and a water sports and dive centre. There is also an overwater silent cinema, a tennis court, a labyrinth gardens, an eco-centro and a Children’s Den on the main island.

Valid for stays:

  • Travel From: 12 May - 24 Jul & 01 - 30 Sep, 2017  /  $8,749* per person
  • Travel From: 17 Apr - 11 May + 25 Jul - 31 Aug + 01 Oct - 17 Dec. 2017  /  $13,899* per person

For Other Travel Dates:

Click on the Enquiry button below.

*Conditions apply:

Prices are per person, based on twin share and in AUD Dollars. See terms and conditions below.

Prices are per person, twin share, inclusive of all pre-payable taxes and subject to availability at time of booking. Valid for sales and travel as specified. All prices are subject to change at any time without notice. Conditions, amendment and cancellation fees apply. Free nights & discounts are already included in costs. Travel insurance is strongly recommended.

At Overwaterbungalows.com.au we have long recognized the desire for many of our international travellers to stay in an Overwater Bungalow. When it comes to a dream tropical getaway it doesn’t get any better than dangling your toes into dazzling blue water from the deck of your very own Overwater Bungalow or maybe having a personal outdoor pool overlooking the crystal clear waters of these magnificent lagoons. We have enchanted many of our clients as they experience the magic & luxury of our over water destinations. Our expertise is offering you the best of Maldives resorts, Tahiti resorts, Fiji resorts, Malaysia resorts, Philippines resorts, Vanuatu resorts , Samoa resorts and many other resorts that offer Overwater Bungalows from around the world.

Suite 3, Level 27 Governor Macquarie Tower - 1 Farrer Place Sydney NSW 2000 AUSTRALIA ABN: 67611671188
